external_games.name: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: SoI - Scenario 6 "Battle of Itsukushima"

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 6: Battle of Itsukushima
summary: An additional playable scenario, "The Battle of Itsukushima". This scenario centers around the great strategist Motonari Mori, and the time he made his move. This is the story of men who dreamed of conquest, and risked their lives.
